column5: Anyone want to take a fishing course.  learn to fish

Alas it's too far to travel for me, could be a fun way to spend some time, might even learn a thing or two;)  Ya know, like what the heck "flippin" is and all that good stuff.  One day Georgian will offer it....  Maureen
Interesting that the course dates are outside of bass season!!  Jon
I dont run it I just post interesting things that might help out others.  Before gives ya the heads up and you,ll be ready,maybe.
Seneca College also has a bass fishing class along with ice fishing stuff  http://www.senecac.on.ca/parttime/pip-fishing.html
I wonder if I would be able to pass that course!LOL HH
Thats one class i wouldn't mind taking.
That's so you can learn all you need to know before Bass season opens...  Maureen
